sentence.Network_en: She lookd at him, her eyes passive and calm.
sentence.Network_cn: 她望着他, 眼神温顺而平静.

sentence.Network_en: We lookd forward to the delicate fragrance of ripe strawberries at harvest time.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们盼望收获时节草莓成熟时飘来的沁人心脾的芳香.

sentence.Network_en: " It lookd rainy. "" If anything, it will be fine. "
sentence.Network_cn: “ 看起来天要下雨. ” “ 正相反, 将是个好天. ”

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
